price: 38. Alle slechte eigenschappen hiervan zijn bij jullie Heer gehaat.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
